title: ECB ponders coronavirus checkpoints to play games behind closed doors
description: The ECB could install coronavirus checkpoints and isolation units at cricket grounds in order to play games behind closed doors.
content:
Elworthy is a former South Africa Test bowler who has organised men's and women's World Cups in England
The England and Wales Cricket Board could install coronavirus checkpoints and isolation units at grounds in order to resume the game behind closed doors.… [+1138 chars]
